column5: I 2nd the vote for Tomahawk . They are Great People
Looking for a resort to trail my boat to on LOTW or Eagle.
Check out www.birchdalelodge.com 807-227-5262 owners name is Marcel Pinette. This will be my 26th year there. They have a boat ramp at the lodge. Located on the NE portion of Eagle Lake on Myers Bay.
What Terry said.The camp boats are nice, but with my family of 4 we take our boat.
Mylies Place Resort about 45 minutes north of Baudette and great area to fishSent from my SCH-I545 using Tapatalk
Very Nice place, These people treat You Very well!www.tomahawkresort.com

I spent three weeks there last year and couldn't say enough positive things about it. The owners are fantastic people, the lodge and cabins are great, price was very good, and there's a tonne of dock space with shore power. It's a 15 min boat ride from the launch (Nestor Falls) to the lodge and it's located in Sabaskong Bay. The area doesn't see as much boat traffic as the north end of the lake, and there were days when we only saw one or two other boats on the water. Scott knows the lake like the back of his hand and can put you on fish immediately. The fishing was fantastic, and in the end that's what matters the most! http://www.lakeofthewoodslodge.com/
